mapper.insert: insert into sys_operation ( MENU_PERMISSION_ID, NAME, ACTION, REMARK ) values ( #{sysMenuPermission.menuPermissionId}, #{name}, #{action}, #{remark} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_operation SET NAME = #{name}, ACTION = #{action}, REMARK = #{remark} WHERE OPERATION_PERMISSION_ID = #{operationPermissionId}
mapper.select: select sop.OPERATION_PERMISSION_ID, sop.MENU_PERMISSION_ID, sop.NAME, sop.ACTION, sop.REMARK from sys_operation sop where sop.OPERATION_PERMISSION_ID=#{operationPermissionId}
select OPERATION_PERMISSION_ID , NAME as NAME, ACTION as ACTION, REMARK as REMARK from sys_operation where MENU_PERMISSION_ID=#{menuId}
select Operation_Permission_Id from sys_role_operation where ROLE_ID=#{roleId}
select action as ACTION,name as NAME,remark as REMARK from sys_menu union select action as ACTION,name as NAME,remark as REMARK from Sys_Operation
